nodes.text: Clone counselors were individuals who assisted the clone troopers of the Galactic Republic's Grand Army. In 22 BBY, a member of Breakout Squad suggested to the Jedi commander Nuru Kungurama that Sharp, in actuality a Clawdite bounty hunter, was acting strangely and should see the counselors.
Clone counselors were first referenced in Ryder Windham's novel The Clone Wars: Secret Missions 3: Duel at Shattered Rock.
